roi_analyser module¶

Created on Mon Sep 23 15:17:27 2019

@author: richard

roi_analyser.blurry_coefficient(image)¶
roi_analyser.delta_blurry_coeff(array, stride=1)¶
roi_analyser.get_blurred_difference(data)¶

Get the difference in blurriness between the roi and one with a gaussian filter applied. if the ROI is blurry to start with, the difference between the two values should be small
